name: Zero
description:
Zero awakes in a foreign planet, you have to help him finding a way to his home planet. You are at the beginning of a long journey, and you don’t have any special skill, you are only able of copying and learning from others. 

 

Explore a foreign planet and face its dangers, fight with different enemies and learn their own skills. You are able of scanning others behaviour to copy it and consequently acquire new capabilities. Use the new learned abilities to fight, discover secrets, solve puzzles and more.

Collect items to power yourself and unlock new areas, but be observant, sometimes they can be well hidden. Talk with different friendly characters that will help you orientate in this strange planet. Discover the heart of the deep alien forest in its ruins, a series of dungeon that will test your strength and wit with several puzzle games, traps and hostile bizarre creatures.

You are free to go where you want, and when you want, the open world structure of the game provides player with freedom of exploring a colourful and amusing environment.     

Zero is an adventure game developed for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
